thread.title: One night stay in a great location
thread.title_full: One night stay in a great location - Review of London House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: RionaArjoon
title: One night stay in a great location
text:
We really enjoyed our stay here, close to the stations, bus stops. The room, although small, was neat and tidy, and we felt we didn't need more as we were out most of the time. It was great to open the windows and see the lovely garden view. The staff was helpful and did keep our bags in storage when we left for the day.
Room Tip: Garden view room See more room tips
